word_mean_info__list.difference: 在这些词中语气最强，可与despite换用，口语或书面语中均可使用。
语气最弱，仅表示一种障碍的存在。
书面用词，指不受某事或某种原因的阻碍，语气轻于in spite of。

word_group.brief_definition: 不由自主地；身不由己地

bilingual.source: Ali bought a new computer game despite the price.
bilingual.target: 尽管价格昂贵，阿里还是买了一个新的电脑游戏。

bilingual.source: It was expensive, but he decided to buy the suit despite that.
bilingual.target: 尽管很贵，他还是决定买那套西装。

bilingual.source: But despite the wind and the rain, I still enjoy working outside in the wild.
bilingual.target: 但尽管有风有雨，我仍然喜欢在野外工作。

bilingual.source: Despite not having any money, Laith spent hours in the department store.
bilingual.target: 尽管没有钱，莱斯在百货商店里待了好几个小时。

bilingual.source: Yet, despite all this, by the end of the trip many were already planning to return.
bilingual.target: 然而，尽管如此，到旅行结束时，许多人已经计划返回。

bilingual.source: Despite arguments over “stupid things” now and then, Alistair agrees that having a brother is an advantage.
bilingual.target: 尽管偶尔会因为“愚蠢的事情”争吵，阿利斯泰尔认为有个弟弟是个优势。

bilingual.source: Despite the difficulties, scientists hope future discoveries will not only enable us to understand how the universe began.
bilingual.target: 尽管有困难，科学家们希望未来的发现不仅能让我们了解宇宙的起源。
尽管下雨了，他们还是留下了。
尽管他有小缺点，她还是爱他。

list.abstract: 《Despite》是由歌手Tiger Lillies演唱的一首英文歌曲，于1994年1月1日发行，收录于专辑《Births，Marriages and Deaths》中。

yingyinNormal.en: And then he disappears magically, despite having no money to his name.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后神奇般的消失了，尽管他名下穷得一分钱都没有。

yingyinNormal.en: The house of Abrasax continues to thrive, despite the squandering of your inheritance, brother.
yingyinNormal.zh: 尽管弟弟你“昏迷无度”，阿拜萨斯家族繁荣依旧。

yingyinNormal.en: I say that because, despite our troubles we are one community. One family.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我这么说是因为尽管有种种问题，我们仍然团结在一起，我们仍然是一家人。

yingyinNormal.en: Despite the risks of this collective existence, many species use the reef as a nursery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 尽管这种集体生活存在风险，很多物种还是将珊瑚礁作为了栖息地。

yingyinNormal.en: Despite my privileged upbringing, I'm actually quite well balanced. I have a chip on both shoulders.
yingyinNormal.zh: 尽管我的成长很特别，但我的生活是十分和谐的。我是很有钱的。

yingyinNormal.en: Ms. Todd being followed by a spotter and arrested, despite the fact she didn't steal anything. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 托德小姐被一位店员盯上，随后她被捕，尽管她并没有偷东西。谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: No. I surrendered to you, because, despite your attempt to convince me, otherwise, you seem to have a conscience, Mr. Kirk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我向你投降是因为尽管你一直让我觉得你没有良知，可你好像还是有的，柯克先生。

yingyinNormal.en: So in some sense we are self might be creative despite the price cure the relationships rather than having it be a part of the reality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从某种意义上讲是因为我们内心的期望尽管价格也会产生影响但期望才是主要原因

yingyinNormal.en: He saw me as weak. Despite what I did, people still rumor of my decline and they worry for succession.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他就是视我为弱者，尽管我以强者的姿态做事，但大家还是散布谣言，说我日渐衰弱，说他们担心大位的继承。

yingyinNormal.en: I flatter myself, cousin, that your refusal is merely a natural delicacy. Besides, you should take into account that despite manifold attractions, it is by no means certain another offer of marriage may ever be made to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说句自不量力的话，你的拒绝正符合女人家微妙的天性，此外，尽管你有许多吸引人的地方，但不会有另外一个人再向你求婚了。

yingyinNormal.en: It was very entertaining, despite the glaring story problem.
yingyinNormal.zh: 倒挺适合打发时间，虽然有显而易见的情节漏洞。

yingyinNormal.en: Despite Singapore's high urban density, the island is incredibly fertile.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然新加坡是个人口稠密的都市，岛上土地却十分肥沃。

yingyinNormal.en: Really? Despite the sign that says "Do not leave laundry unattended"?
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗？你没见那块牌子上写"不要远离在洗的衣物"么？

yingyinNormal.en: Why did they eat them for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, despite their doctor's warnings?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么他们会拿它当早餐、午餐和晚餐呢，甚至无视他们医生的警告呢？
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water》

yingyinNormal.en: Despite recent events, I do consider our experiment in cohabitation to have been positive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 撇开最近的事不谈，我的确觉得我们的同居实验得出了正面的结果。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, but they have no Icee machines. Despite my aggressive letter-writing campaign, I might add.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，可是那里没有刨冰机，还完全不理睬我那么多封投诉信，错上加错。

yingyinNormal.en: Despite whatever you may have heard, America is actually the number-one manufacturing nation on earth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除了这些你听说过的，美国是地球上最大的制造业国家。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course, I was 14. And I'd already achieved more than most of you could ever hope to, despite my 9:00 bedtime.
yingyinNormal.zh: 忘了说，我14岁，不过我已经取得了你们大多数人望尘莫及的成就，虽然我九点上床。

yingyinNormal.en: Despite the violent incident at the voting center in Knoxville, which the president is attending to as we speak.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然诺克斯维尔投票中心发生了暴力事件，我们说话这会总统正在进行处理。

yingyinNormal.en: These seeds are so tough, in fact, that it's said that despite being fired from a gun, they can still germinate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些种子是如此坚硬，据说就算从枪膛中射出之后，它们依然可以发芽。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Mayor Jose Luis Martinez-Almeida made opposition to the zone a centerpiece of his election campaign, <highlight>despite</highlight> its success in improving air quality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 市长何塞·路易斯·马丁内斯·阿尔梅达将反对该区域作为其竞选活动的核心，尽管该区域在改善空气质量方面取得了成功。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Despite</highlight> trade competition and outsourcing, American manufacturing still needs to replace tens of thousands of retiring boomers every year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管存在贸易竞争和外包，美国制造业仍然需要每年替换成千上万退休的婴儿潮一代。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Despite</highlight> the appeals court's decision, big questions remain unanswered.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管上诉法院做出了裁决，但一些重大问题悬而未决。

word_usage.usage: despite和in spite of都有“虽然，尽管”之意， 但despite更书面，指不受某事或某种原因的阻碍，语气轻于in spite of；despite of也表示“不管，尽管”，但是较少使用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 不管; 尽管; 无论

examination_example.sentence: Scientists have proven that <highlight>despite</highlight> their poorly developed small eyes, these bats still can see during the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们已经证明，尽管它们的小眼睛发育不良，这些蝙蝠仍然可以在白天看到东西。

examination_example.sentence: And yet <highlight>despite</highlight> how these employees feel, it's obviously important for their manager to nonetheless find out how to keep them motivated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，不管这些员工的感受如何，对他们的经理来说，找到如何保持他们积极性的方法显然是重要的。

examination_example.sentence: On the flip side, there are many "forced riders", who are suffering from the climate change impacts <highlight>despite</highlight> having scarcely contributed to the problem.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而另一方面，也有许多“被迫搭车者”，他们是气候变化的受害者，尽管他们并不是造成这一后果主要的罪魁祸首。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

sense_info_list.zh: 不管; 尽管; 无论

examination_example.sentence: And, <highlight>despite</highlight> setbacks, the tide may finally be turning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且，尽管遭遇挫折，潮流可能最终会逆转。

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>despite</highlight> the sticky situation, firefighters and police attending to the cleanup were reportedly cheerful about the long task ahead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管形势严峻，但据报道，参与清理工作的消防员和警察对未来的漫长任务感到高兴。

examination_example.sentence: Ideas about learning by doing have struggled to become mainstream educationally, <highlight>despite</highlight> being old concepts from Dewey and Montessori, Plato and Aristotle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “做中学”的思想一直难以成为主流，尽管这些古老的理念源自 Dewey 、Montessori、 Plato 、Aristotle。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 书面用词，指不受某事或某种原因的阻碍，语气轻于 in spite of。
语气最弱，仅表示一种障碍的存在。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 不管; 尽管; 无论

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 不管; 尽管; 无论

examination_example.sentence: In time for the trial performance, I was able to maintain power in my singing <highlight>despite</highlight> the switch to a head voice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在试唱时，尽管换成了头声，但还是能够保持唱歌的力量。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Despite</highlight> the celebrations, though, in the U. S. the jazz audience continues to shrink and grow older.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而尽管有庆祝活动，但在美国，爵士乐观众继续减少并变老。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 不管; 尽管; 无论

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 不管; 尽管; 无论

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Despite</highlight> there being different views on the reason for curiosity, most experts reach an agreement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管对产生好奇心的原因有不同的看法，但大多数专家达成了一致。

examination_example.sentence: Both animals and humans are willing to take a risk to satisfy their curiosity <highlight>despite</highlight> knowing that the result will remain unchanged.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 动物和人类都愿意冒险来满足他们的好奇心，尽管知道结果不会改变。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Despite</highlight> the pain I felt that day, it was a gift they had given me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管那天我感到很痛苦，但这是他们给我的礼物。
